Created attachment 25873

creator: gadams@apache.org
vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Hi Glenn,

Thanks for your patch. However, as I said we need to agree on a project-wide Checkstyle configuration first. Before enforcing a no-warning policy it is necessary to reach consensus among all the developers on a set of rules that everyone is happy to follow.

We'll have a look at your patch once this is done. Meanwhile, I'll look at the parts that fix compilation warnings.

Thanks,
Vincent

creator: spepping@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 25884
Transcript of javadocs generation

I get 56 javadocs warnings, whereas you get none. How come?

creator: spepping@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #6)
> Created an attachment (id=25884) [details]
> Transcript of javadocs generation
> 
> I get 56 javadocs warnings, whereas you get none. How come?

I will fix these warnings in the HEAD revision of trunk, unless you want to do it.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text:

> Created an attachment (id=25884) [details]
> Transcript of javadocs generation
> 
> I get 56 javadocs warnings, whereas you get none. How come?

not sure; my attached transcript file is verbatim output: there were no javadoc warnings; i am using JDK 1.6.0_20 on MAC OS X 10.6.4;

(In reply to comment #7)
> > I get 56 javadocs warnings, whereas you get none. How come?
